full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ZAB LAM BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR GYI SGO NAS BYANG CHUB LAM RIM NYAMS LEN BYA TSUL RAB GSAL SGRON ME LAS NGAG 'DON ZUR BKOL BDE LAM SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,, ,,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @026a *, ,(CES ZAB BLA MA'I RTZAL 'BYOR SGO NAS BYANG CHUB LAM RIM NYAMS SA LEN BYA TSUL RAB GSAL SGRON ME LAS NGAG 'DON ZUR BKOL BDE LAM SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BLA MA MCHOG GSUM LA MI PHYED PA'I DANG PA DANG LDAN PA, ,THAS RJE MER RGEN JO NONG TSE RING SKYABS DANG, THAS JES THU MING HO GNYIS KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS BSKUL BA LTAR, DPAL MGON BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE MING CAN GYIS CHU MO GLANG LO'I STON ZLA THA TSE BRGYAD LA GUNG AER TE NI MER GENG TAS CHING GI SGAR NOR BU CHOS 'PHEL GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI CHOS DON GRUB KYIS BKYIS DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
author_simple: DPAL MGON BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE,
dates_of_the_author_(зохиогдсон_өдөр): CHU MO GLANG LO'I STON ZLA THA MA'I TSE BRGYAD,
